name: FiniteGrp.mk.inj
initialProofState:
toGrp✝ : Grp
isFinite✝ : Finite ↑toGrp✝
toGrp : Grp
isFinite : Finite ↑toGrp
x✝ : Eq (FiniteGrp.mk toGrp✝) (FiniteGrp.mk toGrp)
⊢ Eq toGrp✝ toGrp
decl:
/-- The category of finite groups. -/
@[pp_with_univ]
structure FiniteGrp where
  /-- A group that is finite -/
  toGrp : Grp
  [isFinite : Finite toGrp]

name: FiniteGrp.mk.injEq
initialProofState:
toGrp✝ : Grp
isFinite✝ : Finite ↑toGrp✝
toGrp : Grp
isFinite : Finite ↑toGrp
⊢ Eq (Eq (FiniteGrp.mk toGrp✝) (FiniteGrp.mk toGrp)) (Eq toGrp✝ toGrp)
decl:
/-- The category of finite groups. -/
@[pp_with_univ]
structure FiniteGrp where
  /-- A group that is finite -/
  toGrp : Grp
  [isFinite : Finite toGrp]

name: FiniteGrp.mk.sizeOf_spec
initialProofState:
toGrp : Grp
isFinite : Finite ↑toGrp
⊢ Eq (SizeOf.sizeOf (FiniteGrp.mk toGrp)) (HAdd.hAdd (HAdd.hAdd 1 (SizeOf.sizeOf toGrp)) (SizeOf.sizeOf isFinite))
decl:
/-- The category of finite groups. -/
@[pp_with_univ]
structure FiniteGrp where
  /-- A group that is finite -/
  toGrp : Grp
  [isFinite : Finite toGrp]

name: FiniteAddGrp.ofHom_apply
initialProofState:
X Y : Type u
inst✝³ : AddGroup X
inst✝² : Finite X
inst✝¹ : AddGroup Y
inst✝ : Finite Y
f : AddMonoidHom X Y
x : X
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.ConcreteCategory.hom (FiniteAddGrp.ofHom f)) x) (f x)
decl:
@[to_additive]
lemma ofHom_apply {X Y : Type u} [Group X] [Finite X] [Group Y] [Finite Y] (f : X →* Y) (x : X) :
    ofHom f x = f x :=
  rfl

name: FiniteGrp.ofHom_apply
initialProofState:
X Y : Type u
inst✝³ : Group X
inst✝² : Finite X
inst✝¹ : Group Y
inst✝ : Finite Y
f : MonoidHom X Y
x : X
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.ConcreteCategory.hom (FiniteGrp.ofHom f)) x) (f x)
decl:
@[to_additive]
lemma ofHom_apply {X Y : Type u} [Group X] [Finite X] [Group Y] [Finite Y] (f : X →* Y) (x : X) :
    ofHom f x = f x :=
  rfl
